content: As an AI language model, I can say that mobile gaming has already emerged as a major segment of the gaming industry, with significant growth predicted in the coming years. Mobile gaming has become very popular due to the convenience and accessibility of smartphones, and advancements in technology have increased the quality and diversity of games available on mobile devices. AR and VR technology are also likely to enhance the gaming experience on smartphones, making mobile gaming even more appealing to players. With the growth of the mobile gaming industry, it's possible that we'll see a significant shift towards mobile gaming in the future, especially as smartphones continue to become more powerful and capable.
